issue_diagnosis: Model memorized by prompt type, not image content. Vision embeddings not distinguishing between images.

results.expected_start:
tan woon yann

BOOK TA .K (TAMAN DAYA) SDN BHD
results.generated_start:
tan woon yann

BOOK TA .K (TAMAN DAYA) SDN BHD
results.note: Correct start but degrades with repeated spaces

tan woon yann

INDAH GIFT & HOME DECO

tan woon yann

BOOK TA .K (TAMAN DAYA) SDN BHD

results.generated_start: Title: Death rates from substance use disorders, 1995

results.expected_start: This image shows a Dakota Digital single-use camera
results.generated_start: This image shows a Dakota Digital single-use camera

results.expected_start: This image shows a large banner advertisement
results.generated_start: This image shows a Dakota Digital single-use camera

results.expected_start: This image shows a close-up of a Stone Brewing beer bottle
results.generated_start: This image shows a Dakota Digital single-use camera

root_causes: 1. Model memorized based on prompt structure, not image features
2. Vision embeddings may not be properly differentiated between images
3. Training may have collapsed to outputting most common answer per prompt type
4. Possible issue: vision encoder features not varying enough between similar images

inference_performance.issue: No KV caching - each token generation re-encodes full image and recomputes all attention
